overview:
As VP of Client Services, Matt leads account management, integration and implementation efforts at PowerReviews. His primary focus is client satisfaction, ensuring that each client realizes all the benefits of our high-quality, industry-leading social merchandising solution throughout the merchantâ€™s shopping experience.

Matt has over 10 years of account and project management experience in the financial, telecommunications and e-commerce industries. Prior to joining PowerReviews, he managed a sales operations team at Qwest Communications and prior to that was a Senior Consultant at BearingPoint. Mattâ€™s first foray in e-commerce was at Fogdog.com and he is a graduate of Stanford University.
